fool.name: Fool
fool.Description: Upright: Beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit. Reversed: Holding back, recklessness, risk-taking

magician.name: Magician
magician.Description: Upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action. Reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

priestess.name: Priestess
priestess.Description: Upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind. Reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence

empress.name: Empress
empress.Description: Upright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance. Reversed: Creative block, dependence on others

emperor.name: Emperor
emperor.Description: Upright: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure Reversed: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility.

hierophant.name: Hierophant
hierophant.Description: Upright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions. Reversed: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo.

lovers.name: Lovers
lovers.Description: Upright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices. Reversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values.

chariot.name: Chariot
chariot.Description: Upright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices. Reversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values.

strength.name: Strength
strength.Description: Upright: Strength, courage, persuasion, influence, compassion. Reversed: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion.

hermit.name: Hermit
hermit.Description: Upright: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance. Reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal

wheel.name: Wheel of Fortune
wheel.Description: Upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point. Reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

justice.name: Justice
justice.Description: Upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law. Reversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty

hanged.name: Hanged Man
hanged.Description: Upright: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives. Reversed: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision

death.name: Death
death.Description: Upright: Endings, change, transformation, transition. Reversed: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.Description: Upright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose. Reversed: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

devil.name: Devil
devil.Description: Upright: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality. Reversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

tower.name: Tower
tower.Description: Upright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose. Reversed: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

star.name: Hanged Man
star.Description: Upright: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality Reversed: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection

sun.name: The Sun
sun.Description: Upright: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality. Reversed: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic

moon.name: Moon
moon.Description: Upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition. Reversed: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.Description: Upright: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution. Reversed: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call
